about.name: Sibiu
about.info_text: Sibiu is a picturesque city located in Transylvania, Romania. Known for its well-preserved medieval architecture, Sibiu offers a unique blend of history, culture, and natural beauty. The city's historic center is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, characterized by cobbled streets, colorful buildings, and charming squares. Visitors can explore medieval fortifications, visit museums, and enjoy the vibrant arts scene. Sibiu is also famous for its festivals, including the Sibiu International Theatre Festival, making it a cultural hub in the region.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 147,245
Country: Romania
Official Language: Romanian
Currency: Romanian Leu (RON)
Time Zone: Eastern European Time (EET, UTC+02:00)
Climate: Continental climate with warm summers and cold winters.

attractions_card.title: Sibiu Historic Center
attractions_card.description: Wander through the enchanting historic center of Sibiu, where you'll find medieval buildings, charming squares, and cozy cafes.

attractions_card.title: Brukenthal National Museum
attractions_card.description: Explore the impressive Brukenthal National Museum, Romania's oldest museum, housing a diverse collection of art and artifacts.

attractions_card.title: Council Tower
attractions_card.description: Climb the Council Tower for panoramic views of Sibiu and the surrounding Transylvanian landscape.

attractions_card.title: Bridge of Lies
attractions_card.description: Discover the mysterious Bridge of Lies, known for its legends and tales of lovers and liars.

attractions_card.alt: ASTRA Museum of Traditional Folk Civilization
attractions_card.title: ASTRA Museum
attractions_card.description: Visit the ASTRA Museum to explore open-air exhibits showcasing Romania's traditional folk culture and heritage.

attractions_card.title: Păltiniș Mountain Resort
attractions_card.description: Head to Păltiniș, a nearby mountain resort, for outdoor activities, hiking, and winter sports.

attractions_card.title: Lutheran Cathedral
attractions_card.description: Admire the Sibiu Lutheran Cathedral, a stunning Gothic church with an iconic spire.

attractions_card.title: Sub Arini Park
attractions_card.description: Relax in Sub Arini Park, a green oasis in the heart of Sibiu, ideal for picnics and leisurely walks.

food_card.title: Mămăligă
food_card.description: Indulge in mămăligă, a traditional Romanian dish of cornmeal porridge, often served with cheese and sour cream.

food_card.title: Sarmale
food_card.description: Try sarmale, delicious cabbage rolls stuffed with a mixture of pork, beef, and rice, typically served during special occasions.

food_card.title: Mititei
food_card.description: Savor mititei, small grilled sausages made from a blend of meats and spices, often enjoyed with mustard and fresh bread.

food_card.title: Papanași
food_card.description: Treat yourself to papanași, a delightful Romanian dessert consisting of fried dough, jam, and sour cream.

food_card.title: Local Bakeries
food_card.description: Visit local bakeries and enjoy fresh bread, pastries, and sweet treats as you explore Sibiu.

hotels_card.title: Historic Hotels
hotels_card.description: Stay in historic hotels with old-world charm and modern amenities, offering a glimpse into Sibiu's past.

hotels_card.title: Boutique Hotels
hotels_card.description: Discover boutique hotels in Sibiu, known for their unique character and personalized service.

hotels_card.title: Guesthouses
hotels_card.description: Experience cozy guesthouses in the city, where you can enjoy a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

hotels_card.title: Modern Accommodations
hotels_card.description: Choose modern accommodations in Sibiu, offering contemporary comfort and style for travelers.

transport_card.title: Sibiu International Airport
transport_card.description: Access Sibiu via the Sibiu International Airport, which provides domestic and limited international flight options.

transport_card.title: Public Transportation
transport_card.description: Utilize public transportation options, including buses, for convenient travel within Sibiu.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Sibiu, offering a convenient way to get around the city.

transport_card.title: Walking and Bicycles
transport_card.description: Explore Sibiu on foot or by bicycle, taking in the city's beauty at a leisurely pace.
